p: The genotoxicity and carcinogenicity data of thujone (α‐ and β‐thujone) have been summarised in the EMA public statement on the use of herbal medicinal products containing thujone (EMA, 2012). Thujone was tested in the framework of the National Toxicology Program (NTP) of the US Department of Health and Human Services (NTP, 2011).
